H0.text: Name the manufacturer of the British World War II bomber the Lancaster. Handley Page

H1.text: Name the manufacturer of the British World War II bomber the Lancaster. Supermarine

H2.text: Name the manufacturer of the British World War II bomber the Lancaster. de Havilland

H3.text: Name the manufacturer of the British World War II bomber the Lancaster. AVRO

A4.text: The Halifax became the second most-prolific British heavy bomber of the war after the Avro Lancaster (itself essentially a four-engine development of the Manchester).
